Package com.sun.identity.wss.security

Class SAML2Token

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.identity.wss.security.SAML2Token
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SecurityToken
    public class SAML2Token
extends Object
implements SecurityToken
    This class SAML2Token represents a SAML2 token that can be inserted into web services security header for message level security.

    This class implements SecurityToken and can be created through security token factory.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.sun.identity.wss.security.SecurityToken
